message: Let's be fair, Bob. I know the money devalues faster for me, so I propose a slight advantage for me to get things started.
I appreciate the sentiment Alice, but let's be realistic. It devalues faster for you, so I propose a similar split, but in my favor.
Bob, this back and forth is pointless.  We both lose if this drags on. I propose a fair 50/50 split. Let's end this.
